title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Research and create requirements.txt for a data analysis project that needs:
- Data reading/writing
- HTTP requests
- Data visualization
- Testing
instructions:
Research and create requirements.txt for a data analysis project that needs:
- Data reading/writing
- HTTP requests
- Data visualization
- Testing

hints.text: Popular choices: pandas, requests, matplotlib, pytest

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
